name: Quinoa with Veggies
author: feminiSh
summary: I love quinoa and I wanted to make something that was flavorful and filling. The vegetables can be changed to your liking!
directions: Bring the quinoa, water, and 1 pinch of salt to a boil in a saucepan
Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until the quinoa is tender, about 20 minutes
Once done, drain a mesh strainer, and set aside
Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat
Stir in the garlic, and cook until the garlic softens and the aroma mellows, about 2 minutes
Add the red pepper, and corn; continue cooking until the pepper softens, about 5 minutes
Season with cumin, oregano, salt, and pepper, and cook for 1 minute more, then stir in the cooked quinoa and green onions
